attributes.action: MAXIMUM PRISON SENTENCE TO BE GIVEN TO ALL SEX OFFENDERS
attributes.additional_details:
I was a child victim of physical and sexual child abuse which affected my whole life but that was many years ago.
I don’t want justice for me I want real justice for the victims been abused now. 
Who will have there heads messed up forever while there abusers walk free it’s a total disgrace to the justice system.
It’s needs to change as peadophiles appear to be the real pandemic we should be dealing with.
The children are our future and they need real justice now to lower these anus crimes that are carried out on them. It’s always on the increase an escalating problem that needs to be dealt with more severely for future prevention.

Kind regards 

J Brown
attributes.background: To many sex offenders are walking away with minimum sentences many even with a suspended sentence and they are free to reoffend again even though they destroy the life of there victims where’s the justice in that.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608804
